description.zh-cn: 叙利亚复兴党政权下的最后一任叙利亚总统，叙利亚阿拉伯复兴社会党地区领导机构末任书记。其政权在2024年12月被叙利亚反对派推翻后流亡俄罗斯。
description.en: The last President of Syria under the Ba'athist regime and the final regional secretary of the Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party – Syria Region. He went into exile in Russia after his government was overthrown by the Syrian opposition in December 2024.

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚前总统，巴沙尔·阿萨德的父亲。他在2000年去世前，培养其子巴沙尔作为接班人。
description.en: Former President of Syria and father of Bashar al-Assad. Before his death in 2000, he groomed his son Bashar as his successor.

description.zh-cn: 哈菲兹·阿萨德的妻子，巴沙尔·阿萨德的母亲。
description.en: Wife of Hafez al-Assad and mother of Bashar al-Assad.

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德的长兄，原定的总统接班人，于1994年因车祸去世。
description.en: Older brother of Bashar al-Assad and the original designated successor to the presidency, who died in a car accident in 1994.

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德的妻子，前叙利亚第一夫人。
description.en: Wife of Bashar al-Assad and former First Lady of Syria.

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德的弟弟，领导叙利亚共和国卫队和第四装甲部队。
description.en: Younger brother of Bashar al-Assad, who commanded the Syrian Republican Guard and the 4th Armoured Division.

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德的姐姐，阿瑟夫·沙乌卡特的妻子。
description.en: Older sister of Bashar al-Assad and wife of Assef Shawkat.

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德的姐夫，曾任叙利亚军队的副总参谋长。
description.en: Brother-in-law of Bashar al-Assad, who served as the deputy chief of staff of the Syrian army.

description.zh-cn: 在叙利亚内战中反对巴沙尔·阿萨德政府的政治及武装团体总称。于2024年12月推翻了阿萨德政权。
description.en: A collective term for political and armed groups opposing the government of Bashar al-Assad during the Syrian Civil War. They overthrew the Assad regime in December 2024.

description.zh-cn: 2024年12月8日，叙利亚反对派武装攻占首都大马士革，结束了阿萨德家族长达53年的统治。
description.en: On December 8, 2024, Syrian opposition forces captured the capital Damascus, ending the 53-year rule of the Assad family.

description.zh-cn: 始于2011年叙利亚反政府示威的武装冲突，最终导致了2024年阿萨德政权的垮台。
description.en: An armed conflict that began with the 2011 Syrian uprising, ultimately leading to the fall of the Assad regime in 2024.

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚反对派于2024年11月下旬发起的一系列军事行动，迅速攻占叙利亚多个主要城市，并最终导致阿萨德政权垮台。
description.en: A series of military operations launched by the Syrian opposition in late November 2024, which rapidly captured several major Syrian cities and ultimately led to the fall of the Assad regime.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦，一个横跨欧亚大陆的国家。在巴沙尔·阿萨德政权垮台后，为其提供了政治庇护。
description.en: The Russian Federation, a country spanning Eastern Europe and Northern Asia. It granted political asylum to Bashar al-Assad after the fall of his regime.

description.zh-cn: 位于叙利亚首都大马士革的一所公立大学，巴沙尔·阿萨德曾在此学习医学。
description.en: A public university in Damascus, the capital of Syria, where Bashar al-Assad studied medicine.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国伦敦的一所眼科医院，巴沙尔·阿萨德曾于1992年在此学习。
description.en: An ophthalmology hospital in London, United Kingdom, where Bashar al-Assad studied in 1992.

description.zh-cn: 位于叙利亚霍姆斯的一所军事院校，巴沙尔·阿萨德在被其父选为接班人后曾在此学习。
description.en: A military academy in Homs, Syria, where Bashar al-Assad studied after being chosen as his father's successor.

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚的立法机关。曾在2000年为巴沙尔·阿萨德顺利继任总统而修改宪法。
description.en: The legislative authority of Syria. In 2000, it amended the constitution to allow for Bashar al-Assad's succession to the presidency.

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚的国家元首职位。
description.en: The position of the head of state of Syria.

nodes.id: 阿拉伯复兴社会党－叙利亚地区

zh-cn: 阿拉伯复兴社会党－叙利亚地区
叙利亚阿拉伯复兴社会党
en: Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party – Syria Region

description.zh-cn: 一个叙利亚政党，自1963年以来一直是叙利亚的执政党，直到2024年阿萨德政权垮台。
description.en: A Syrian political party that was the ruling party of Syria from 1963 until the fall of the Assad regime in 2024.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰教什叶派的一个分支，阿萨德家族所属的教派。虽然在叙利亚是少数，但在阿萨德政权时期控制着国家安全部队。
description.en: A branch of Shia Islam to which the Assad family belongs. Despite being a minority in Syria, they controlled the state security forces during the Assad regime.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰教的主要教派，在叙利亚占人口多数。许多逊尼派民众对由少数派阿拉维派主导的阿萨德政权抱有怨恨。
description.en: The main branch of Islam, constituting the majority of the population in Syria. Many Sunnis harbored resentment towards the Assad regime, which was dominated by the minority Alawites.

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚武装力量的精锐部队，在阿萨德政权时期由其弟马赫尔·阿萨德领导。
description.en: An elite unit of the Syrian Armed Forces, commanded by his brother Maher al-Assad during the Assad regime.

description.zh-cn: 2003年由美国发动的军事行动，巴沙尔·阿萨德对此表示坚决反对。
description.en: A military campaign initiated by the United States in 2003, which Bashar al-Assad strongly opposed.

description.zh-cn: 始于2011年1月的叙利亚大规模反政府示威活动，是叙利亚内战的前奏。
description.en: Large-scale anti-government protests in Syria that began in January 2011, serving as a prelude to the Syrian Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚在内战期间举行的一次总统选举，巴沙尔·阿萨德以88.7%的得票率成功连任，但选举的公正性受到广泛质疑。
description.en: A presidential election held in Syria during the civil war, in which Bashar al-Assad was re-elected with 88.7% of the vote. The fairness of the election was widely questioned.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国。在叙利亚内战期间，曾对阿萨德政府采取军事行动。
description.en: The United States of America. It took military action against the Assad government during the Syrian Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 美国第45任及第47任总统。于2017年下令对叙利亚政府军空军基地发动导弹袭击。
description.en: The 45th and 47th President of the United States. In 2017, he ordered a missile strike on a Syrian government airbase.

description.zh-cn: 由美国总统特朗普下令，针对叙利亚政府军设施的军事打击行动，以回应汗谢洪化学武器袭击事件。
description.en: A military strike ordered by U.S. President Trump against Syrian government facilities in response to the Khan Shaykhun chemical attack.

description.zh-cn: 由阿拉伯复兴社会党统治下的叙利亚政府，由阿萨德家族长期领导，于2024年12月被推翻。
description.en: The Syrian government under the rule of the Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party, led for a long time by the Assad family, which was overthrown in December 2024.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西共和国。其法院于2025年就霍姆斯市爆炸案对巴沙尔·阿萨德发出逮捕令。
description.en: The French Republic. Its courts issued an arrest warrant for Bashar al-Assad in 2025 in connection with the bombing of the city of Homs.

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚首都，巴沙尔·阿萨德的出生地及前执政中心。
description.en: The capital of Syria, birthplace and former center of power for Bashar al-Assad.

nodes.id: 德米特里·阿纳托利耶维奇·梅德韦杰夫

zh-cn: 德米特里·阿纳托利耶维奇·梅德韦杰夫

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治人物，曾任俄罗斯总统。于2010年与巴沙尔·阿萨德会面。
description.en: Russian politician, former President of Russia. Met with Bashar al-Assad in 2010.

nodes.id: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

zh-cn: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 巴西政治人物，曾任巴西总统。于2010年与巴沙尔·阿萨德会面。
description.en: Brazilian politician, former President of Brazil. Met with Bashar al-Assad in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 一个统治叙利亚超过五十年的政治家族，属于阿拉维派。
description.en: A political family that ruled Syria for over fifty years, belonging to the Alawite sect.

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德是哈菲兹·阿萨德的次子。
description.en: Bashar al-Assad is the second son of Hafez al-Assad.

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德是阿妮萨·马赫路夫的儿子。
description.en: Bashar al-Assad is the son of Anisa Makhlouf.

description.zh-cn: 在其长子巴塞勒·阿萨德于1994年去世后，哈菲兹·阿萨德决定培养其次子巴沙尔作为其政治接班人。
description.en: After the death of his eldest son Bassel al-Assad in 1994, Hafez al-Assad decided to groom his second son Bashar as his political successor.

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德是巴塞勒·阿萨德的弟弟。
description.en: Bashar al-Assad is the younger brother of Bassel al-Assad.

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德于2000年12月与阿斯玛·阿萨德结婚。
description.en: Bashar al-Assad married Asma al-Assad in December 2000.

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德于1965年9月11日出生于大马士革。
description.en: Bashar al-Assad was born in Damascus on September 11, 1965.

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德在大马士革大学学习医学，并于1988年毕业。
description.en: Bashar al-Assad studied medicine at Damascus University and graduated in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 1992年，巴沙尔·阿萨德到英国伦敦的西区眼科医院学习。
description.en: In 1992, Bashar al-Assad went to the Western Eye Hospital in London, UK, to study.

description.zh-cn: 在被确定为接班人后，巴沙尔·阿萨德进入霍姆斯军事学院学习。
description.en: After being designated as successor, Bashar al-Assad entered the Homs Military Academy to study.

description.zh-cn: 2024年12月8日，叙利亚反对派攻占大马士革，推翻了复兴党政权的统治。
description.en: On December 8, 2024, the Syrian opposition captured Damascus, overthrowing the rule of the Ba'athist regime.

description.zh-cn: 阿萨德政权的垮台结束了巴沙尔·阿萨德的总统任期，迫使其流亡海外。
description.en: The fall of the Assad regime ended Bashar al-Assad's presidency, forcing him into exile.

description.zh-cn: 2024年叙利亚反对派发动的攻势，最终导致了阿萨德政权的垮台。
description.en: The offensive launched by the Syrian opposition in 2024 ultimately led to the fall of the Assad regime.

description.zh-cn: 长年的叙利亚内战最终导致巴沙尔·阿萨德的政权被推翻。
description.en: The long-running Syrian Civil War ultimately led to the overthrow of Bashar al-Assad's regime.

description.zh-cn: 在阿萨德政权垮台后，俄罗斯政府为巴沙尔·阿萨德及其家人提供了政治庇护。
description.en: After the fall of the Assad regime, the Russian government granted political asylum to Bashar al-Assad and his family.

description.zh-cn: 2000年哈菲兹·阿萨德去世后，叙利亚议会立即将宪法规定的总统年龄下限从40岁调低到34岁，以便巴沙尔能顺利当选总统。
description.en: After Hafez al-Assad's death in 2000, the Syrian parliament immediately lowered the constitutional minimum age for the president from 40 to 34, allowing Bashar to be elected president smoothly.

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚占多数的逊尼派民众对由少数阿拉维派主导的阿萨德政权抱有深深的怨恨。
description.en: The Sunni majority in Syria harbored deep resentment towards the Assad regime, which was dominated by the Alawite minority.

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德坚决反对美国在2003年发动的伊拉克战争。
description.en: Bashar al-Assad firmly opposed the 2003 Iraq War launched by the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国总统特朗普下令对叙利亚政府军霍姆斯空军基地发射巡航导弹，以制裁阿萨德政府。
description.en: U.S. President Trump ordered the launch of cruise missiles against the Homs airbase of the Syrian government forces to sanction the Assad government.

description.zh-cn: 美国对叙利亚政府军空军基地的导弹袭击是对阿萨德政权涉嫌使用化学武器的惩罚性打击。
description.en: The U.S. missile strike on a Syrian government airbase was a punitive action against the Assad regime for its alleged use of chemical weapons.

description.zh-cn: 法国法院就2012年霍姆斯市爆炸案向巴沙尔·阿萨德发出逮捕令。
description.en: A French court issued an arrest warrant for Bashar al-Assad in connection with the 2012 bombing of the city of Homs.

relationships.target: 德米特里·阿纳托利耶维奇·梅德韦杰夫

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德于2010年与时任俄罗斯总统梅德韦杰夫会面。
description.en: Bashar al-Assad met with then-Russian President Dmitry Medvedev in 2010.

relationships.target: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德于2010年与时任巴西总统卢拉会面。
description.en: Bashar al-Assad met with then-Brazilian President Lula in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德是阿萨德家族的核心成员。
description.en: Bashar al-Assad is a core member of the Assad family.

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德于2000年7月17日至2024年12月8日担任叙利亚总统。
description.en: Bashar al-Assad served as the President of Syria from July 17, 2000, to December 8, 2024.

relationships.target: 阿拉伯复兴社会党－叙利亚地区

description.zh-cn: 巴沙尔·阿萨德于2000年6月18日至2024年12月8日担任阿拉伯复兴社会党－叙利亚地区总书记。
description.en: Bashar al-Assad served as the General Secretary of the Arab Socialist Ba'ath Party – Syria Region from June 18, 2000, to December 8, 2024.

position.zh-cn: 共和国卫队及第四装甲部队指挥官
position.en: Commander of the Republican Guard and 4th Armoured Division

description.zh-cn: 马赫尔·阿萨德领导的精锐部队是其兄长巴沙尔·阿萨德政权的重要军事支柱。
description.en: The elite forces led by Maher al-Assad were a key military pillar of his brother Bashar al-Assad's regime.
